Career opportunities

We are seeking individuals to join our dedicated and talented team. Candidates will be joining the 80 + team in a rapidly expanding and dynamic business specialising in prestigious new build and renovated family homes. Whether you are searching for a specific role, a new location or just really want to work for an incredible brand with incredible people, we’re looking for smart, driven and emotionally intelligent people with a passion for property.


Benefits

Octagon provide a range of benefits designed to make you feel valued in your role, ensuring a variety of employee wellness options that support the mental, physical and financial health of you and your family.
